QuestData.Title: Sugar, Spice, and Everything Nice
QuestData.Description:
There! Now I have all I need for Sylvie!
And just in time. I doubt she would have lasted much longer like this.
But... I need someone to help me. I'd ask Cally but... would you mind assisting me again?
Let me know when or if you're ready, $n.
QuestData.RewardText:
I've healed her, but she is clearly still in distress.
Hm, I wonder if...
